author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2261 - Enable support for NodeType based indexing rules (WIP)
Compatibility support - Impilement logic to adapt existing index config to IndexRule based config
* If no declaredNodeType defined then existing 'properties' config is mapped to rule for type nt:base
* If declaredNodeType defined then non inheritable rule is defined for each nodeType

author: khmarbaise
msg: - Fixed integration tests which had not been running.

author: jailletc36
msg: avoid dereferencing a recently apr_pool_clear()'ed event_conn_state_t *cs
in several paths where ptrans is being recycled at the end of a request.
